Trade/Device Name(s): BD MiniDraw™ Capillary Blood Collection System with BD MiniDraw™ SST™ Capillary Blood Collection Tube
BD MiniDraw™ SST™ Capillary Blood Collection Tube
BD MiniDraw™ Capillary Tube Adapter SST™
Specimen Container(s): BD MiniDraw™ SST™ Capillary Blood Collection Tube
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Centrifugation with silica-based clot activator and gel separator
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MiniDraw Capillary Blood Collection System with MiniDraw SST Tube for collecting and processing capillary blood samples for serum chemistry testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to collect, separate, transport, and store capillary blood from individuals 18+ years for measurement of specific serum chemistry analytes listed; for use by trained healthcare workers.
